titles.title: To revise certain requirements relating to the Department of Veterans Affairs pilot program of enhanced contract care authority for health care needs of veterans in highly rural areas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: 6/26/2009--Introduced. Amends the Veterans' Mental Health and Other Care Improvements Act of 2008 to revise the location requirements for participation of a verteran in a highly rural area in the pilot program under which the Secretary of Veterans Affairs (VA) provides health services to a covered veteran through qualifying non-Department of Veterans Affairs health care providers.
